ABOUT_DESC: Connect and Collaborate on Your Next Adventure!
FEATURE_1: Create Your Own Trip: Public or private travel plans.
FEATURE_2: Join Existing Trips: Find journeys that match your goals.
FEATURE_3: Interactive Pinboard: Plan itineraries, check flights, book hotels, and set dates together.
FEATURE_4: Seamless Integration: Manage travel logistics with ease.
COMMUNITY_DESC: Travelship is more than an app; it's a community ready to explore the world. Start your journey today!
